= ImageJ Web Site... =

'''Takes you to the ImageJ home.'''

This command opens a browser and takes you to the ImageJ website: http://rsb.info.nih.gov/ij/

In linux, the command expects any of the following browsers installed (tested in this order): netscape, firefox, konqueror, mozilla, opera, epiphany or lynx. If you want a particular browser to be launched, here is [[a simple solution]].
